wd.setting.gmOnly.title: GM Only Access
wd.setting.gmOnly.hint: Restricts access to gm accounts only to prevent malicious use.
wd.setting.icon.title: Render Chat Window Icon
wd.setting.response.title: Allow Response
wd.setting.response.hint: When sending a dialog to a player, when the player accepts or rejects, it sends back a response to the sender.
wd.dialog.notGMError: This module is restricted to GM use only.
